Posts.Content: Feb 3, 2010 12:39PM kerriannrose wrote: I had a stereo biopsy yesterday.  They were able to remove the calcium cluster completely so now I wait.  Friday at the earliest, Tuesday at the latest.  I just want an answer.  And it's hard to take your mind off of it when your boob hurts.
Posts.Title: The Waiting is the Worst... hopeful01 MBCR
